fr.reflexe.viewshell.api.auth

Interface IDirectoryService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IAttachable

    public interface IDirectoryService
extends IAttachable
    An OpenAGE user directory.

    Thread safety: implementations are required to be safe for concurrent read/write access.

    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    REFLEXE Technologies

    • Method Summary

      IUser getUser(String principal)
      Gets the user account handle for the specified user principal.

    • Method Detail

      • getUser

        IUser getUser(String principal)
        Gets the user account handle for the specified user principal.
        Parameters:
        principal - the user's login principal.
        Returns:
        the user, if a match is found, or null.
        Since:
        1.0
        See Also:
        IUser.getPrincipal()
